text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
(1) IRM 6.300.4 is obsoleted to ensure this guidance is removed from all IRS electronic Publishing sites.
IRM 6.300.4 is made obsolete by IRM 6.330.1, Recruitment, Recruitment, Selection and Placement, dated December 31, 2009.
